Slides

ng-conf 2015
DevTools: State Of The Union 2015

Tools, libs

a1atscript – the angular 2 polyfill
advice.js – simple AOP module
angular-ux – a library that helps you create live, navigable prototypes with the help of angular but without having to learn how to code
AnyBar – osx menubar status indicator
dna2json – formats your genome file as json
ember-magic-man – a lightweight data persistence library for ember
eslint-plugin-angular – eslint plugin for angular applications
eslint-plugin-react – react specific linting rules for eslint
estoc – a static analyzer for npm packages
framerKit – iOS controls recreated in Framer, for your prototyping pleasure
functional-javascript – a list of functional javascript resources
generator-nm – scaffold out a node module
ghfollowers – a service to get and receive GitHub followers
github-add-collab – add collaborators to github repos
github-token-user – get the github user from a token
hson-loader – hson-loader for webpack
HTML-GL – get as many fps as you need and amazing effects by rendering html/css in webgl
interlock – a file encryption front-end
Ionic-Material – seamless Material Design theme for Ionic
isomorphic-todo – proof of concept isomorphic examples
jasmine-es6-promise-matchers – es6 promise compatible jasmine matchers
js_data – data manipulation and processing in javascript
jsConsoleApiReference – reference of methods for the console object in various browsers and javascript environments
kitematic – a simple application for managing docker containers on osx
link-bin – make bin scripts work local npm dependencies
logdown – a debug utility for the browser and the server with markdown support
medium-style-confirm – medium.com style confirm dialog
meteor-template-inspector – inspector for Blaze templates
nanybar – control AnyBar from your node scripts
newtab – custom New Tab page
node-module-boilerplate – boilerplate to kickstart creating a node module
npmdl – conveniently download files from npm packages
os-locale – get the system locale
postcss-normalize-url – normalize urls with PostCSS
postcss-zindex – reduce z-index values with PostCSS
react-boilerplate – boilerplate for a react project
react-es6 – react's official tutorial with es6 and browserify
react-scaffold – an opinionated setup built on learnings from large applications
react-toggle – an elegant, accessible toggle component for react
rmodal.js – a simple modal dialog with no external dependencies
sequence-viewer – a protein sequence viewer with highlight and coverage capabilities written in javascript
SnowPen – chrome extension to copy inspected element html and css to codepen
stringformatter – an extensible, garbage collecting Javascript string formatter
super-react – opinionated command line tool for scaffolding out nested react components into files
superagent-bluebird-promise – add promise support to superagent using Bluebird
textures – a javascript library for creating svg patterns
to.is – data filtering, sanitization and validation library
watchlist – a movie list app built with react
yarsk – yet another react starter kit
